### 搜索页-展示为单行

1. 调用分页接口；
1. 请求参数和分页接口一样；

#### 示例

```vue
<template>
  <search-page-line ref="page" class="monitor-list" :url="url" :toolConfig="toolConfig">
    <template v-slot:tool="{ selectedData }">
      <dg-button type="primary" @click="exportBkdx(selectedData)">导出</dg-button>
    </template>
    <template v-slot="{ data }">
      <div class="monitor-list__item">
        {{ data }}
      </div>
    </template>
  </search-page-line>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'monitor-list',
  data() {
    return {
      url: '/table-page/monitor',
      condition: [
        { name: 'gjyjsj', op: '=', value: '20200616000000,20200622235959', type: '', format: '' },
        { name: 'bksj', op: '=', value: '20200616000000,20200622235959', type: '', format: '' }
      ],
      sort: { BKJZSJ: 'asc' },
      toolConfig: { class: 'monitor-list__tool', checkbox: true }
    };
  },
  methods: {
    init() {},
    exportBkdx(selectData) {
      this.$refs.page.exportData();
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.init();
  }
};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.monitor-list {
  &__item {
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.09);
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }
  /deep/ .monitor-list__tool {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }
}
</style>
```
